Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class thrust::system::cpp::reference< T >

reference is a wrapped reference to an object stored in memory available to the cpp system. reference is the type of the result of dereferencing a cpp::pointer.

Template Parameters:
TSpecifies the type of the referenced object.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename T>
__host__ __device__ thrust::system::cpp::reference< T >::reference ( const pointer &  ptr) [inline, explicit]

This constructor initializes this reference to refer to an object pointed to by the given pointer. After this reference is constructed, it shall refer to the object pointed to by ptr.

Parameters:
ptrA pointer to copy from.

Reimplemented from thrust::reference< T, thrust::system::cpp::pointer< T >, thrust::system::cpp::reference< T > >.

template<typename T>
template<typename OtherT >
__host__ __device__ thrust::system::cpp::reference< T >::reference ( const reference< OtherT > &  other,
typename thrust::detail::enable_if_convertible< typename reference< OtherT >::pointer, pointer >::type *  = 0 
) [inline]

This constructor accepts a const reference to another reference of related type. After this reference is constructed, it shall refer to the same object as other.

Parameters:
otherA reference to copy from.
Template Parameters:
OtherTThe element type of the other reference.
Note:
This constructor is templated primarily to allow initialization of reference<const T> from reference<T>.
